Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1079.jpg'}
{3: 'Prefab houses, like shipping containers, stand in neat rows behind barbed wire and guard towers. As far as one can see, snow-covered mountains stretch on forever.'}
{3: 'The gray walls still keep out the cold but look pretty small against the mountains and wilderness.'}
{3: 'Putting up thicker walls to keep the heat in is just a quick fix—the generator fuel will run out eventually.'}
{3: 'But first, there is an even bigger problem—'}
{3: 'In this endless winter, ice is the only water source. Breaking and getting ice is how they get clean water.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'The water collection crew is back.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before you can focus again, the armed water collection team has already returned to camp as promised.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leader', 3: 'Hook the pipe up here.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The leader puts the rifle under his coat, giving quick orders to the others.'}
{3: 'A young man turns on the pump and connects the worn hose to the water tank.'}
{2: 'Any problems?', 3: '20'}
{2: 'Leader', 3: 'Same old, some small stuff needs filtering out.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The middle-aged man breathes on his hands, rubs his stiff fingers, and opens the report.'}
{2: 'Leader', 3: "The ice melter's acting up. We'll send it for repairs later.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leader', 3: "Also, parts of the river's melting, so it's risky to walk on. That's causing problems with the digging.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: "The river's melting?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vanessa frowns, thinking.'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "The outside temperature hasn't gone up, so this shouldn't be happening...", 4: '1'}
{2: "The Mutated Red Tide's messing with the ice?", 3: '29'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leader', 3: "It's probably not the Red Tide. If it was, we'd see something weird in the ice with our own eyes.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He nods to the young man, who pulls a metal tube from his bag.'}
{2: 'Leader', 3: 'We took the temperature of the meltwater and collected some samples.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leader', 3: 'This warm water is 5.8 degrees warmer than the freezing point.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leader', 3: "Considering the rate of the heat loss... there's probably a hot spring upstream.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'His breath turns into tiny ice crystals in the air, then disappears as he stops talking.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Same as always, send the samples to the lab.', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1112.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1112.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'She stares blankly at the far-off mountains covered in pine trees—where the river starts.'}
{3: 'If the Mutated Red Tide really starts messing with the water, you can use the stored ice for a bit, but once the contaminated water gets into the system...'}
{3: 'Humans might never find clean water in this area again.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1079.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{2: "Keep using the meltwater until we know what's in those samples.", 3: '51'}
{2: 'Thanks for your hard work, everyone. Go get some rest and get ready for lunch.', 3: '52'}
{3: "The pump's quiet now, and the ice melter's empty. The clean water's filled that huge tank, like an old grain silo, to the brim."}
{3: 'That water tank is the only thing keeping this camp alive.'}
{3: "The young man drags the hose back to the vehicle, but the team leader still won't move."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leader', 3: '【kuroname】, Ms. Vanessa...', 4: '2'}
{3: "The middle-aged man took off his gloves at some point, his rough fingers nervously rubbing the rifle's stock."}
{2: 'Leader', 3: "Can't we at least check out that possible hot spring?", 4: '2'}
{3: "He anxiously cranes his neck forward, trying to read Vanessa's face."}
{2: 'Leader', 3: "If it really was a hot spring, we wouldn't have to melt ice anymore. Collecting water would be way easier...", 4: '2'}
{2: "That mountain's too far out for our patrols.", 3: '65'}
{2: "We can't take that risk.", 3: '66'}
{2: 'Leader', 3: "But, last month, Mrs. Jones' little girl... she died because we didn't have enough water...", 4: '2'}
{3: "Sadness fills the middle-aged man's eyes, his eyebrows covered in frost."}
{3: 'Vanessa turns away, annoyed.'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "No one's explored that mountain. No one knows if it's got the Mutated Red Tide or some other monster in it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Risk losing a whole team for a "possible" water source?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He cracks his knuckles, wanting to argue but not knowing what to say.'}
{2: 'Leader', 3: 'I just wanted to...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Don't even think about it. Now, go back and eat.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She says coldly, shutting him down.'}
{2: "Let's wait for the test results before we talk about it.", 3: '81'}
{3: "If the tests show the river's melting isn't from the Mutated Red Tide, and if there's really a hot spring, it could actually help us."}
{2: 'Leader', 3: '...I understand. Thank you.', 4: '2'}
{3: "The man's shoulders slump in defeat. He nods to you and gets on the transport vehicle with heavy, weary steps."}
{3: 'Watching the team head to rest, Vanessa impatiently checks the water tanks.'}
{2: 'The water collection team leader, if I remember correctly...', 3: '88'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "It's Joe. Joe Williams.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After a moment, she adds...'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Mrs. Jones' youngest daughter, Liata, is his kid.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Makes sense?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "This kind of thing... you think it's unusual?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She smirks coldly while recording the water storage.'}
{3: 'After checking the Punishing Virus level around the tanks, Vanessa puts away her logbook and heads back to the outpost.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory733.jpg'}
{3: 'Back inside, the frost on your eyelashes and face melts right away. A sharp pain hits the back of your head, but you quickly warm up.'}
{2: 'If that place really is a hot spring...', 3: '102'}
{2: 'Maybe it could help with our water problem, for a while.', 3: '103'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'It would only be a short-term fix.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Even if the hot spring isn't contaminated, it's still groundwater. The Mutated Red Tide can get through anything."}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'The Red Tide will get into the water cycle eventually since it can penetrate rock formations easily.', 4: '1'}
{3: "She snorts, like she's laughing at the idea."}
{2: 'Even a short-term fix is better than nothing.', 3: '109'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'False hope is useless. We need to find ways to clean the water...', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1105.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{3: "The Red Tide's slowly spreading across this dead land, ruining every bit of clean ground."}
{3: "Humans can't fight fate anymore."}
{3: "Their enemy isn't just a Corrupted, a Hetero-Creature, or some weird Hetero-Sapiens, but this whole frozen wasteland, the dark sky, and the mountains they can't cross."}
{3: 'The enemy is the frozen rocks. The enemy is the melting ice caves.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1105.jpg'}
{3: 'The enemy is the Mutated Red Tide spreading across the planet, and the new "life" it\'s making.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory733.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory733.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Don't look so defeated.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her eyes tell you to stop lying.'}
{3: 'You thought getting the Hetero Tower core would fix everything, but now...'}
{3: "Looks like you haven't gotten anywhere."}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "I've told you before, this world doesn't need a hero.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She glances over, then changes the subject.'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Has Rosa been in touch? How's the Hetero Tower core coming along?", 4: '1'}
{2: "She said she'd have news today and she'd call.", 3: '139'}
{3: "Ever since she got the Hetero-Core Shard, Rosa's been locked in the lab, trying to make the filter better to fight the evolving Red Tide."}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "I'll head out—oh, it's already 12 o'clock.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "If you forget to eat, I'll toss you into the Red Tide before you starve.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She shows that familiar smirk and then heads out of the outpost.'}
{3: 'Just as Vanessa leaves, harsh static crackles through your crude communication device.'}
{3: 'A faint voice fights through the static, forming clear words after a few broken ones.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory941.jpg', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{2: 'Rosa', 3: "...Aerospace City calling Commandant. Is the camp's water supply still safe?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Safe for now.', 3: '155'}
{3: "You brief Rosa about the melting of the river's surface."}
{2: 'Rosa', 3: "If it really was a hot spring, that'd be a rare bit of good news...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A soft sigh comes through your comms.'}
{2: 'Rosa', 3: "Unfortunately, the decoding's still not going well.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Have you managed to crack the outer layer of encryption?', 3: '161'}
{2: 'Rosa', 3: "Getting past the outer layer wasn't the problem, but we've only managed to get less than one percent of the data from the Hetero Tower core.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosa', 3: "The technology's incredibly complex. With what Aerospace City has right now... I can only do a basic exploration, trying to get whatever I can.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosa', 3: "I'm hoping we can unlock some filter-related things next. We need to strengthen the filter barrier, or I'm worried the Mutated Red Tide will keep evolving...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Take your time.', 3: '165'}
{3: 'She falls silent.'}
{3: "Time's the thing you have the least of."}
{2: 'Rosa', 3: 'Oh, right, I actually called about something else...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She perks up, and you hear the sound of pages turning.'}
{2: 'Rosa', 3: "I've put together a list of materials we might need to strengthen the filter barrier.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosa', 3: "The red items are crucial, and the rest are things I think we might need based on what I've learned from the Hetero-Core Shard.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosa', 3: 'If you find any of these while gathering supplies, help me collect them.', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'll tell Vanessa too.", 3: '177'}
{2: 'Rosa', 3: 'Thank you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosa', 3: "If that's all, I'll get back to the lab...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She made the call, but you do have something you need to confirm with her.'}
{2: 'About that consciousness enhancement device you mentioned earlier...', 3: '182'}
{2: 'Rosa', 3: "I need to stress again, that was just a theory from Mr. Asimov. The technology's super complex, and we barely have the materials or environment to make it...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosa', 3: 'Commandant, what are you planning to do with the consciousness enhancement device?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her calm voice comes through the speaker.'}
{2: "I'm worried we might have to deal with a big fight soon.", 3: '187', 4: '...', 5: '187'}
{2: "I can't connect to too many Constructs at once with this Mind Beacon.", 3: '188'}
{2: 'Rosa', 3: "It's definitely a possibility.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'No one knows what kind of monsters the Mutated Red Tide might throw at you.'}
{2: "Let's call it a backup plan, then.", 3: '191'}
{3: "The sound of pages turning comes back; Rosa's probably checking the supplies for Aerospace City."}
{2: 'Rosa', 3: 'The supplies from Aerospace City give you a chance to test things out...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosa', 3: "But I can't promise it'll work, and I don't know how reliable it'll be.", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's fine, this is enough.", 3: '197'}
{2: 'Thank you, Rosa.', 3: '198'}
{2: 'Rosa', 3: "Alright, I'm heading back to the lab.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosa', 3: 'Take care, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her voice cuts out. Static fills the speaker as the device loses signal.'}
{3: 'The room goes quiet and humid. You sit for a moment, thinking, then get up and leave.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory731.jpg'}

{3: 'This place, called "canteen", is basically a big makeshift building made of shipping containers. It\'s also the camp\'s meeting hall, storage, and sometimes, even a place where people can relax for a bit.'}
{3: 'Against all odds, a small community based on helping each other has sprung up in this barren place.'}
{3: "It's already afternoon. The refugees who were assigned tasks should be back by now."}
{3: 'When you walk into the canteen, there are only a few people sitting at the tables, waiting for the night shift.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Refugee A', 3: 'I heard Joe volunteered to lead some crazy water-finding team, and Vanessa really yelled at him!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: "It's all because of Mrs. Jones... Geez, everyone wants to live, right?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Refugee A', 3: "Yeah, Liata... she's the youngest here, isn't she?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: "She's only eighteen.", 4: '2'}
{3: "The young men's discussion brings a brief silence to the table."}
{2: 'Refugee A', 3: "Alright, let's change the subject.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Refugee A', 3: 'Still, Vanessa really put Joe in his place with just a couple of words...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He fiddles with a small package, looking excited.'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: "Vanessa's so awesome! I want to go with them next time they look for supplies...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Refugee A', 3: "Hey, don't think of something impossible. Vanessa wouldn't send you on a suicide mission... Anyway, want some lemon slush?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He seems bored of the gossip and starts talking about food.'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: "Did those stupid books rot your brain? You think you're some fancy guy from the old days?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: '"Oh, my dear sir, is this your seat? One slush coming right up..."', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The young man theatrically mocks his friend with exaggerated loudness.'}
{2: 'Refugee A', 3: 'Take it or leave it—but check this out! This ice? I got it from the pipes around the canteen. Super clean, I promise.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He pulls out a small paper packet and carefully pours some yellow powder into the bottle.'}
{3: 'Then he puts the lid on, shakes it gently, and gives it to the person next to him.'}
{2: 'Refugee A', 3: 'This is my secret recipe, you know—', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The troublemaker takes the kettle, looks at it suspiciously, opens it, and takes a sip—then his face twists up.'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: 'Pfft! Yuck! What is this? These are just those vitamin C pills, right?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Refugee A', 3: "It's called making the best of a bad situation! If you're so smart, go steal some canned fruit yourself...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He whispers, but someone cuts him off.'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: 'Are you crazy or do you have a death wish? Vanessa will kick you out if you steal anything.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: "Besides, the last can of fruit went to Liata. It didn't save her, but at least she got something sweet before she died...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: 'Oh! Commandant!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Good afternoon.', 3: '241'}
{3: "You have overheard their whole conversation, but you don't need to tell them to stay away from the supplies."}
{3: "Vanessa's strict rules have worked pretty well, and anyway... there's hardly anything worth stealing in this tiny camp."}
{3: 'Except for their food rations, the refugees only have weapons and some small things they cherish too much to give up.'}
{3: 'Weapons keep order, and their trinkets remind them of what they live for.'}
{3: 'After you say hello, everyone hurries to work, and you go to get some food.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mess Cook', 3: 'Commandant! Working late again?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mess Cook', 3: "I've saved some hot soup for all of you. It's still warm on the stove.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mess Cook', 3: "Emma's been waiting for you and helped out while she waited...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Emma', 3: 'Here, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Emma comes out of the kitchen with some food.'}
{2: 'What do you need from me?', 3: '257'}
{2: 'Emma', 3: 'We need to switch out patrol teams.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Emma', 3: "The medic from Anneva's team is hurt and needs to rest. We're thinking of pulling a medic from Isu team to fill in...", 4: '1'}
{2: "The Isu medic's already done two shifts in a row.", 3: '260'}
{2: 'Emma', 3: "Guess we'll have to get some of the reserve medics.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Emma writes in her notebook while you eat some dry rations and water-thin soup to ease my cramping stomach.'}
{2: 'Emma', 3: "Hmm... Oh, there's something else...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After we figure out the patrol teams, Emma moves on.'}
{2: 'Emma', 3: "The river water samples are in, and we've got the results.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bad news?', 4: 'Is it contaminated?'}
{3: "Emma looks worried—whatever she's about to say is definitely bad."}
{2: 'Emma', 3: "We didn't find any clear signs of the Red Tide, but the water's definitely contaminated in a weird way. I think...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'There are Hetero-Creatures near the water source.', 3: '270'}
{2: 'Emma', 3: "Or, the Mutated Red Tide's already spread to those pine forests.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Either way, it means Great Tombstone Settlement's water's gone. That's the real problem."}
{2: "We'll have to move north, and fast."}
{3: "Rosa says the Punishing Virus doesn't do well in really cold places."}
{3: "Aerospace City's started putting up new filters, and people from Great Tombstone and other camps are moving there in groups."}
{3: "But if there really is a problem with the water source, they'll have to move faster."}
{2: 'Emma', 3: "Got it. I'll tell Vanessa.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'While you talk, people start gathering at the table. Soon, the scattered few in the canteen all congregate in one place.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Refugee B', 3: 'We have to move again?', 4: '1'}
{3: "The young man's face shows a practiced fear."}
{2: "But we'll keep everyone safe.", 3: '285'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: 'How can this be happening? We just got here...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Refugee A', 3: 'What are you waiting for? Go pack your stuff.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Refugee A', 3: "Even if we don't have much, we still need to sort through it.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'People start talking all at once until Emma calms them down, and they head off.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1080.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3801_10.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{3: 'Night falls, and people gather around the fire again to stay warm.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Refugee B', 3: 'Gee, I thought we could stay here for a while...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Refugee A', 3: "Moving's actually good! Did you hear? Aerospace City's got new, better filters!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He tries to sound happy, to cheer everyone up.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Refugee B', 3: "...Fine, I'll go finish packing.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The young man sighs and walks away from the fire but suddenly bumps into someone in a long robe...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Refugee B', 3: 'Oh, sorry, my bad...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "It's alright. Where are you heading in such a hurry?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: "Ugh, haven't you heard? We're on the move again.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: 'Seriously, when will this ever stop? Move, move, move...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Wait... has that Commandant—Gray Raven—come back yet?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The woman under the hood looks a bit confused.'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: 'Yeah, things have gotten a lot better since that Gray Raven Commandant showed up.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: "They've put up those filters in Aerospace City, and the camp's way more organized now, but...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Sadness fills his eyes.'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: "No matter what, it's still just one human...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'He says "one" with a bitter tone.'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: 'Just one human... However capable this person is, there is only so much that can be done.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: 'Geez, I better get going, gotta pack... You should get your stuff together too.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: "If we get attacked again, you'll have to leave everything behind... That's how I lost the key my mom left me last time.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: 'She said it was the key to the front door of my old home.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Refugee B', 3: 'But... where does "home" even lie now?', 4: '2'}
